[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601389117710{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Red-teaming2.jpg?id=12306) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Red Teaming

Is your organisation secure from real-world risks? Our Red Teaming service can help you find out.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right center” css=”.vc_custom_1600961795444{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Red-Teaming-3.jpg?id=12894) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Red Teaming

Is your organisation secure from
real-world risks? Our Red Teaming
service can help you find out.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1588849858825{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/yellow-middle-section.jpg?id=8868) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1599745746523{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:-230px|padding_top_large:60px|padding_right_large:50px|padding_bottom_large:60px|padding_left_large:50px|margin_top_medium:-230px|padding_top_medium:60px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:20px|padding_left_medium:30px|margin_top_small:-230px|padding_top_small:60px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:20px|padding_left_small:30px”]

Why do you need Red Teaming security testing?

[vc_row_inner gap=”25″ css=”.vc_custom_1595431128178{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}” el_class=”square-icons” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:50px|padding_right_large:60px|padding_left_large:60px|padding_top_small:50px|padding_right_small:0px|padding_left_small:0px”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Identifies weaknesses in your processes to prepare for a real-world attack.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Improves your organisation’s defences and remain competitive.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433029046{margin-right: -20px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Enables you to make informed cybersecurity decisions for more effective outcomes.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Red Teaming is a service designed to help you find out how secure your physical spaces are from real-world threats. The findings then give you information on how you can prevent these attacks.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600432760224{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Red-Teaming.jpg?id=11187) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Identifying weaknesses and real-world risks

[vc_column_text]Our Red Teaming security testing is a full-scale simulated attack, virtual as well as physical, on your organisation. Our testing will not only give you a clearer picture of how well your systems and networks can prevent a hack, both through cyber and physical means, but also how quickly you can detect the hack and respond to it.

The service includes a threat and risk analysis session to determine your most important assets, the most likely groups that would target them, and their methods and motivations.

We then devise tests for all scenarios, the results of which are provided to you in a report. This gives you a summary of the risks identified and key messages that you can use to develop a security-aware culture in your organisation.

In essence, we help you identify weaknesses and real-world risks from attacks, and use the information to help you prevent them and drive a cultural change within your business.[/vc_column_text]

Do you know if your organisation is safe from threats, including state-sponsored attacks, organised crime and hacktivist groups?

Contact us
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1596545179269{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/474996146″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1596543124502{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”60px” el_class=”mobile-hidden”]

What we offer

[vc_empty_space height=”60px” el_class=”mobile-hidden”][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Open-source intelligence gathering (OSINT)

As with the first stage of any operation, our targeted Red Teaming attack begins with investigating your company and employees, gathering information that is inadvertently revealed. This comes from a variety of sources with a focus on the social media pages of the staff. We use this to plan our attacks, both cyber and physical.

Email spear phishing attacks

Cyber criminals use information gathered from your employees to gain access to your organisation’s systems and data. Our red teams use social engineering to get personal information from targets within your team and use this to get them to reveal their username and password, or open an attachment that would let us into their computer.

Physical intrusion

If your organisation is susceptible to physical intrusion, attackers can gain access to steal sensitive information as well as planting keylogger devices, or compromising the network. Our Red Teaming security testing solutions include planning and executing a similar physical intrusion into your company to see how vulnerable you are to such attacks.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600878087267{margin-top: 0px !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:100px|margin_top_medium:100px” el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

External and internal network security

We identify devices in your organisations that may have been insecurely configured as these might be used to break into your organisation. Our Red Teaming security testing will also find other possible methods of intrusion and try to exploit them to gain access to your internal network. If successful, we will attempt to escalate our privileges to gain access to sensitive data.

Vishing

Since not all information gathering exercises by hackers is online, we will also assess how secure your organisation is against telephone social engineering attempts. Our trained team of telephone social engineers will call employees to see if they can get them to divulge sensitive login information or to get them to open an attachment sent as a spear phishing attack.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

"I need a trusted partner that can provide additional security services into my portfolio."

Managing Director

Enhance your portfolio with our suite of cybersecurity services Find out more

“As a security manager I know the benefit of carrying out simulated cyber attacks on our systems. I need a service provider that can handle my requirements.”

Security Manager

Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your environment Find out more

“I need a supplier that understands the importance of implementing and maintaining Information Security best practices critical to our ongoing success and reputation.”

Managing Director

Get real-time ongoing cyber detection & response Find out more

“My job is to ensure that our business is protected against cyber security attacks. I need a company that can hunt for and eradicate threats.”

CISO

24/7 ongoing monitoring to hunt for and eradicate threats Find out more

“I need a company that can deliver cutting-edge training to my staff, ensuring they are empowered to recognise and defend against cyber security threats.”

Head of Training

Training and advisory services to empower your staff Find out more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601389135762{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-about” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
